DOC.brief_summary: The propose study four-arm randomize control trial ( RCT ) 48 village Lakes region Tanzania compare relative effectiveness 4 vector control intervention reduce malaria transmission control vector population area An gambiae s.s pyrethroid carbamate resistant : 1/ standard long lasting insecticidal net ( LLIN ) , 2/ LLIN incorporates piperonyl butoxide ( PBO ) synergist , 3/ long lasting indoor residual spray ( IRS ) formulation use conjunction standard pyrethroid LLIN 4/ long lasting indoor residual spray ( IRS ) formulation use conjunction LLIN incorporate PBO synergist . The trial provide epidemiological , entomological , economic social evidence impact , investigator shall measure reduction malaria prevalence malaria transmission rate EIR , change frequency resistance , mosquito specie ratios economic cost effectiveness . The propose trial demonstrate whether novel LLIN long last IRS formulation effective control An.gambiae s.s. reduce malaria prevalence current practice conventional LLIN . There great interest conduct trial . Alternative vector control product limit new insecticide suitable use LLINs IRS .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Novel Long Lasting Insecticidal Net Indoor Residual Spray Product
DOC.detailed_description: JUSTIFICATION OF THE STUDY The district Muleba subject IRS pyrethroid ( lambdacyhalothrin ) every year 5 year President Malaria Initiative ( PMI ) programme . The malaria vector Anopheles gambiae s.s. predominant Muleba region show high level resistance pyrethroid insecticides [ 14 ] . In World Health Organisation ( WHO ) resistance test pyrethroid use IRS , An gambiae s.s. show level mortality range 8 % 40 % , indicate high frequency resistance across entire district . Mortality permethrin , pyrethroid use LLIN distribute UCC ( Olyset Net ) 22 % . Entomological study present author show pyrethroid resistance mechanism kdr almost 100 % Muleba An.gambiae s.s. population elevate level mixed function oxidases non-specific esterases involve detoxification pyrethroids . The carbamate bendiocarb select PMI new insecticide choice IRS region . Following two round bendiocarb IRS January May 2012 , resistance fast emerge . WHO resistance test bendiocarb show mosquito survival rate rise 18 % November 2011 23 % May 2012 69 % November 2012 [ 14 ] . The insecticide An.gambiae show full susceptibility ( 100 % mortality ) organophosphate pirimiphos methyl , propose new IRS intervention . No malaria control trial either Olyset Plus Actellic CS currently propose elsewhere . Olyset Plus seem ideally suit - judging CDC bioassay test permethrin synergist PBO WHO cone bioassay test Olyset Plus - provide protection local pyrethroid resistant An gambiae . IRS Actellic CS seem ideally suit provide long term transmission control . A trial intervention essential restore confidence vector control . By Olyset Plus may sufficient provide personal protection use every night may sufficient provide transmission control entire community . An effective IRS probably efficient way reduce transmission quickly IRS campaign sustain year year expense , desirable risk resistance . The combination LLIN IRS may require drive transmission low level whereafter Olyset Plus sufficient keep prevalence transmission low . 2 RESEARCH PLAN 2.1 Main Objective The main objective research determine relative effectiveness 4 vector control intervention reduce malaria transmission control vector population area An gambiae s.s pyrethroid carbamate resistant : 1/ standard long lasting insecticidal net ( LLIN ) , 2/ Long last insecticidal net incorporate synergist PBO ( Olyset Plus ) , 3/ Long lasting formulation OP insecticide pirimiphos-methyl ( Actellic CS ) indoor residual spraying use conjunction standard pyrethroid LLIN 4/ long lasting indoor residual spray ( IRS ) formulation use conjunction LLIN incorporate PBO synergist . 2.2 Specific Objectives - To determine whether malaria transmit pyrethroid resistant mosquito control use late innovative preventive tool , Olyset Plus , Actellic CS IRS Combination product . - To demonstrate mean community randomise trial NW Tanzania protective efficacy intervention outcomes measure - To define strategy use establish situation possible deploy one intervention , intervention , switch one type intervention another . - To determine cost-effectiveness intervention alone combination facilitate decision resource allocation . - To demonstrate whether combination intervention serve model insecticide resistance management strategy delay future selection resistance . - To provide international malaria control agency evidence enable revise redefine malaria control strategy face grow resistance maintain focus malaria elimination . 2.4 Interventions trialed Olyset plus ( Sumitomo Chemicals ) LLIN contain pyrethroid permethrin synergist piperonyl butoxide PBO active ingredient ( AI ) .Nets combine insecticide plus PBO able control mosquito whose resistance base oxidative metabolism . Olyset net long establish LLIN contain permethrin synergist . Both LLINs approve WHOPES register Tanzania . In experimental hut trial West Africa , Olyset Plus kill twice many resistant mosquito reduce bite rate one third compare Olyset . On exposure two type LLIN 3 minute none An . gambiae mosquito collect Muleba kill conventional Olyset kill Olyset Plus . This indicate type resistance occur Muleba synergised PBO Olyset Plus . This new LLIN potential restore control malaria transmit resistant mosquito population . The propose IRS intervention , Actellic CS ( Syngenta ) , microcapsule formulation organophosphate insecticide , pirimiphos-methyl . This product subject 3 year public-private partnership company , LSHTM , Bill Melinda Gate ( BMG ) Foundation Innovative Vector Control Consortium ( IVCC ) . Microencapsulation greatly extend compound 's residual life apply interior wall ceiling . Parallel trial Benin pyrethroid-resistant mosquito kill 80 % An . gambiae 10 month , unprecedented level effectiveness . Other product test time include bendiocarb , carbamate use last cluster randomise trial Muleba , lambdacyhalothrin , pyrethroid use PMI IRS Muleba previous 5 year . Each vastly inferior short live ( last 1-2 month ) , make pirimiphos-methyl CS best candidate replace carbamate pyrethroid IRS . Combined LLIN IRS . In practice IRS apply alone either conventional LLIN LLIN PBO synergist . An example potential impact conventional LLIN P-methyl CS combination intervention show experimental hut trial Burkina Faso [ 15 ] . In country moderate pyrethroid resistance , pyrethoid LLIN alone kill approximately 50 % mosquito reduce biting ( blood-feeding ) 80 % 24 % . The P-methyl IRS alone kill 100 % mosquito 40 % succeed blood feeding . It combination LLIN spray wall large impact , kill 100 % mosquito prevent bite 93 % , thus illustrate potential benefit combination intervention . Combined LLIN+synergist IRS . This anticipated provide great reduction malaria transmission . For second year intervention IRS monitoring continue observe whether LLIN+synergist sustain reduction transmission transmission bring low combination . 2.5 Methods 2.5.1 Study Area The trial carry district Muleba ( 10 , 70 'S , 310 , 60 ' E ) , western border Lake Victoria , Tanzania . Muleba cover area 3,550 km2 . The annual rainfall range 850 mm 1500 mm ( Igabiro weather station 2006 2012 ) . The district subject blanket IRS pyrethroid lambdacyhalothrin ( ICON 10CS , Syngenta , Basel , Switzerland ) every year 2006 2011 PMI program . Targeted spray bendiocarb ( 400 mg/m2 Ficam 80 % wettable powder , Bayer ) do 2012 & 2013 . As part National Malaria Control strategy , net coverage increase since 2005 net distribution campaign initially target pregnant woman child five 2009 ( 63 % household provide net ) target entire population 2011 . After universal coverage campaign distribution ownership increase 91 % ITN/LLIN usage resident rise 56 % . An evaluation LSHTM 2011-2012 , support PMI , record overall malaria prevalence 23 % ( 95 % CI : 17-29 ) child 15 year . Based previous study mosquito peak April-May Nov-December two rainy season . The malaria vector Anopheles gambiae s.s. predominant Muleba region ( 80 % ) show high level resistance pyrethroid insecticide DDT ( mortality higher 40 % . ) . Following two round bendiocarb IRS January May 2012 , resistance fast emerge . WHO resistance test bendiocarb show mosquito survival rate rise 18 % November 2011 23 % May 2012 69 % November 2012 ( Protopopoff unpublished ) . The kdr-eastern variant present homozygous form 97 % An.gambiae s.s. absent An.arabiensis . 2.5.2 Study Design : The trial conduct 30 month 1 month preparation , 9 month baseline intervention start , 20 month intervention year . IRS apply begin intervention period February-March 2015 increase mosquito density indication start long transmission period . The two type LLIN shall distribute accord cluster randomisation period first round IRS ensure least 80 % household one ( ) LLIN every two people . The propose trial four arm , single blind , cluster randomize factorial design compare 1 . High coverage ( > 80 % access ) conventional Olyset LLIN 2 . High coverage ( > 80 % access ) Olyset Plus LLIN 3 . High coverage ( > 80 % access ) conventional Olyset LLIN high coverage IRS ( > 80 % household spray ) pirimiphos methyl CS 4 . High coverage ( > 80 % access ) Olyset Plus LLIN high coverage IRS ( > 80 % household spray ) pirimiphos methyl CS Randomization 48 Muleba cluster four arm factorial design test difference effect Olyset LLIN Olyset Plus LLIN test effect due IRS pirimiphos methyl versus IRS background LLIN use . The 2 x 2 factorial design strong allow comparison 2 type net , long lasting IRS treatment versus IRS , two intervention together . 2.5.3 Sample Size Estimations The sample size base principle cluster randomise trial [ 16 ] use mean prevalence infection study arm primary outcome . It assume prevalence infection reference arm mean 20 % coefficient variation cluster 0.3 , base recent survey study area , 80 % power 5 % significance would require . Therefore , 48 cluster ( 4 arm 12 cluster ) study would able detect 28 % low prevalence ( prevalence ratio 0.78 ) Olyset Plus relative standard Olyset LLINs arm IRS pirimiphos methyl relative IRS ( 24 cluster per arm two comparison ) , sample 80 child per cluster . Similarly , 40 % low prevalence ( prevalence ratio 0.6 ) could detect individual arm another , example Olyset Plus + IRS v Olyset Plus ( 12 cluster ) .
